She has him under her thumb.
She has never seen him.
She has never sung a song with him.
zh: 她从来没跟他一起唱过歌。

en: She has never visited him.
She hates him.
She heard him cry.
She heard him sing.
She helped him.
She helps him.
She herself helped him.
She hired him.
She hit him again and again.
She hit him with a hammer.
She hit him.
She hugged him.
She intended to go shopping.
She invited him in.
She is cooking for him.
She is helping him.
She is kind to him.
She is kissing him.
She isn't kind to him. In fact, she's not kind to anyone.
zh: 她对他不好。事实上，她对谁都不好。

en: She kicked him.
She killed him with a knife.
She kissed him on the cheek.
She kissed him.
She kissed me, not him.
She knit him a sweater.
She liked Charles as soon as she met him.
zh: 她一见到查尔斯就挺喜欢他的。

en: She likes him.
She listens to him.
She lives with him.
She looked at him angrily.
She looked at him with a smile on her face.
She loves him.
She made him a new coat.
zh: 她给他做了一件新外套。

en: She made him clean his room.
She made him do it.
She made him rich.
She met him for breakfast.
She met him only recently.
zh: 她也是最近才认识他的。

en: She misses him.
She obeys him.
She often calls him names.
She owes him a lot of money.
She persuaded him to do it.
She persuaded him to marry her.
She phoned him as soon as she got home.
zh: 她一到家就给他打了电话。

en: She picked him up at the station.
She pinched him.
She pleaded with him to not leave.
She pleaded with him to stay a little bit longer.
She pleaded with him to stay.
She pointed her finger at him accusingly.
She pointed her finger at him.
She praised him for his honesty.
